promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic ibex normal-type pokemon wearing prismatic gemstones. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemprong, a a young basic ibex normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Grass' Power. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "normal" or "Gemprong". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, ibex-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: Found in quaint village settings, this curly-horned creature taps into the vital energy of grass, adding a burst of vitality to its daily frolics.
